    • Constructor Detail

      • DigestServerAuthenticationMethod

        public DigestServerAuthenticationMethod(java.lang.String defaultRealm,
                                java.lang.String[] algorithms)
                                 throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        defaultRealm - Realm to use when realm part is not specified in authentication headers.
        algorithms - List of algorithms that can be used in authentication.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - If one of algorithms specified in algorithms is not realized in current Java version.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultRealm

        public java.lang.String getDefaultRealm()
        Returns:
        The default realm that is to be used when no domain is specified in authentication headers.

      • getPreferredAlgorithm

        public java.lang.String getPreferredAlgorithm()
        Returns:
        The algorithm that is to be used when no algorithm is specified in authentication headers.

      • generateNonce

        public java.lang.String generateNonce(java.lang.String algorithm)
        Generate the challenge string.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - Encryption algorithm. "MD5", for example.
        Returns:
        a generated nonce. Empty string if specified algorithm is not recognized.

      • doAuthenticate

        public boolean doAuthenticate(Request request,
                     AuthorizationHeader authHeader,
                     java.lang.String user,
                     java.lang.String password)
        Actually performs authentication of subscriber.
        Parameters:
        authHeader - Authroization header from the SIP request.
        request - Request to authorize
        user - Username to check with
        password - to check with
        Returns:
        true if request is authorized, false in other case.
